Uses of Class
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.selectionpolicies.power.PowerVmSelectionPolicy

  • Packages that use PowerVmSelectionPolicy 
    Package Description
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.power  
    org.cloudbus.cloudsim.selectionpolicies.power
    Provides PowerVmSelectionPolicy implementations that define policies to be used by a Host to select a Vm to migrate from a list of VMs.

    • Uses of PowerVmSelectionPolicy in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.allocationpolicies.power

    • Uses of PowerVmSelectionPolicy in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.selectionpolicies.power

      Subclasses of PowerVmSelectionPolicy in org.cloudbus.cloudsim.selectionpolicies.power 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PowerVmSelectionPolicyMaximumCorrelation
      A VM selection policy that selects for migration the VM with the Maximum Correlation Coefficient (MCC) among a list of migratable VMs.
      class  PowerVmSelectionPolicyMinimumMigrationTime
      A VM selection policy that selects for migration the VM with Minimum Migration Time (MMT).
      class  PowerVmSelectionPolicyMinimumUtilization
      A VM selection policy that selects for migration the VM with Minimum Utilization (MU) of CPU.
      class  PowerVmSelectionPolicyRandomSelection
      A VM selection policy that randomly select VMs to migrate from a host.
